Roco Kingdom 4 () is a 2015 Chinese animated fantasy adventure film directed by Hugues Martel and Dongbiao Cao and part of the Roco Kingdom film series. The film was released on 13 August 2015. It was preceded by Roco Kingdom 3 (2014).

* Qi Zhang
* Hu Xia
* Ying Lin
* Guan Xiaotong

* Jia Zhan
